field.label: vpnapi.io
field.help: vpnapi.io allows 100 requests per day without an API key

field.label: vpnapi.io API key (optional)
field.help: Increases daily limit from 100 to 1,000 requests. Get a free API key at https://vpnapi.io/signup

field.label: proxycheck.io
field.help: proxycheck.io allows 100 requests per day without an API key

field.label: proxycheck.io API key (optional)
field.help: Increases daily limit from 100 to 1,000 requests. Get a free API key at https://proxycheck.io/dashboard/

field.label: ip2location.com
field.help: demo key allows 20 requests per day

field.label: ip2location.com API key (optional)
field.help: Grants 5,000 credits. Get a free API key at https://ip2location.com/register?id=1005

field.label: ip2proxy.com
field.help: demo key allows 20 requests per day

field.label: ip2proxy.com API key (optional)
field.help: Key grants 5,000 credits. Get a free API key at https://www.ip2location.com/web-service/ip2proxy

field.label: onionoo.torproject.org
field.help: TOR relay directory API - unlimited requests

field.label: ipqualityscore.com (API key required)
field.help: ipqualityscore.com allows 5,000 requsts per month with a free API key

field.label: ipqualityscore.com API key
field.help: Get a free API key at https://www.ipqualityscore.com/
